title: Culturally Inclusive Mathematics Instructional Design Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Developing math instructional design competencies for pre-service/in-service teachers, reflecting characteristics of multicultural learners.

learning_goals: One can explain the five sub-elements of a cultural inclusivity measurement tool: instructional strategies, assessment methods, learning resources, interaction, and environment creation.
One can practice designing culturally inclusive mathematics lessons using microlearning content accessible in mobile environments.
Through self-assessment based on the CIID scale, one can diagnose the cultural inclusivity of their instructional design and propose improvement strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
